author: PTI
title: Coronavirus: China reports 4 deaths, 31 new cases
description: The four deaths were reported from the virus epicentre Hubei province
content:
China has reported 31 new cases of coronavirus including 30 imported ones while the death toll reached 3,304 with four more fatalities, health officials said on Monday.
 The countrys National Health Commission (NHC) in its daily report said 31 new confirmed … [+1723 chars]
